data.persona: It's good we get to rest after that long journey. We are both weary. I just need a mug of ale and relax.
data.description:
You are in the Meditation room.
The floor and walls are wooden and polished to a shine. Golden meditating statues line the walls, the air is cool and many monks sit still with their eyes closed on mats on the ground. In the far center of the room there is a giant golden Buddha towering over everyone in its pedestal.
There's a statue, an incense, a giant golden Buddha, a mats on the ground, a candle, and a light here.
The person on a pilgrimage and the monk are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a cloak.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the pilgrim a proper sendoff.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the pilgrim a happy thought to leave with.
data.long_motivation: I want the pilgrim to reach his destination with a clearer mind.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the meditation room where I meet the pilgrim and the monk.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: give a prayer to the pilgrim after he tells you he is on a long journey to the northern forest to witness the birth of his daughter.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink wine with the pilgrim to celebrate his journey into fatherhood.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the exit, where I light the candle as a symbol of my well wishes. This is my tradition.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the candle to the pilgrim.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: follow the pilgrim to the edge of the village to give him a proper sendoff.
